birth_place.en: Baokang County, Yunyang Prefecture, Hubei Province

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任武汉市市长、最高人民法院副院长等职，是中国共产党秘密交通工作的创建人之一。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China, who served as the Mayor of Wuhan and Vice President of the Supreme People's Court. He was one of the founders of the secret communication work of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 吴德峰的夫人。
description.en: Wife of Wu Defeng.

description.zh-cn: 吴德峰之父，曾留学日本陆军士官学校，辛亥革命时任苏浙攻宁联军参谋长。
description.en: Father of Wu Defeng, studied at the Imperial Japanese Army Academy, and served as Chief of Staff of the Jiangsu-Zhejiang Allied Army during the Xinhai Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 吴德峰的祖父，曾任朝议大夫，辛亥革命时任湖北省临时议会议员。
description.en: Grandfather of Wu Defeng, served as a Court Gentleman for Consultation, and was a member of the Hubei Provincial Provisional Assembly during the Xinhai Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 吴德峰的伯父，曾留学日本陆军士官学校，辛亥革命时任新军战时司令部参谋长。
description.en: Paternal uncle of Wu Defeng, studied at the Imperial Japanese Army Academy, and served as Chief of Staff of the New Army's wartime headquarters during the Xinhai Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的早期领导人之一。曾任湖北省立第一师范学校校监，并介绍吴德峰加入中国共产党。
description.en: One of the early leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. He served as the headmaster of Hubei Provincial First Normal School and introduced Wu Defeng to the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党创始人之一，与董必武一同介绍吴德峰加入中国共产党。
description.en: One of the founders of the Communist Party of China, who, along with Dong Biwu, introduced Wu Defeng to the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期青年运动领导人之一，吴德峰在校期间的友人。
description.en: One of the early leaders of the youth movement of the Communist Party of China, and a friend of Wu Defeng during his school years.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党左派领导人，曾推荐吴德峰任武汉公安局局长。
description.en: A leader of the left wing of the Kuomintang, who recommended Wu Defeng for the position of Director of the Wuhan Public Security Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第一任国务院总理，曾多次与吴德峰共事，并在文化大革命期间帮助吴德峰恢复名誉。
description.en: The first Premier of the People's Republic of China, who worked with Wu Defeng on multiple occasions and helped restore his reputation during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人，在周恩来汇报后，表示“吴德峰是个好同志”，促使其被“解放”。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. After Zhou Enlai's report, he stated, 'Wu Defeng is a good comrade,' which led to his 'liberation'.

description.zh-cn: 长期负责中共情报和对台工作，曾在文化大革命期间写信反映吴德峰的情况，促使其获得解放。
description.en: Long-term head of CPC intelligence and Taiwan affairs, who wrote a letter during the Cultural Revolution about Wu Defeng's situation, leading to his liberation.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发起和领导的政治运动，期间吴德峰遭到冲击和批斗。
description.en: A political movement initiated and led by Mao Zedong, during which Wu Defeng was attacked and persecuted.

description.zh-cn: 推翻清朝的革命，吴德峰的父亲吴元钧、伯父吴元泽均有参与，吴德峰本人也受其影响参加了革命学生军。
description.en: The revolution that overthrew the Qing dynasty. Wu Defeng's father Wu Yuanjun and uncle Wu Yuanze participated, and Wu Defeng himself was influenced to join the revolutionary student army.

nodes.id: 湖北省立第一师范学校

zh-cn: 湖北省立第一师范学校

description.zh-cn: 吴德峰的母校，当时董必武任校监。
description.en: Wu Defeng's alma mater, where Dong Biwu served as the headmaster.

description.zh-cn: 中国的执政党，吴德峰于1924年加入。
description.en: The ruling party of China, which Wu Defeng joined in 1924.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的主要政党之一，吴德峰曾于1925年以个人身份加入。
description.en: One of the major political parties of the Republic of China, which Wu Defeng joined as an individual in 1925.

description.zh-cn: 武汉市的行政管理机关，吴德峰是其第一任市长。
description.en: The administrative body of Wuhan City, of which Wu Defeng was the first mayor.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，接替吴德峰担任武汉市市长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who succeeded Wu Defeng as the Mayor of Wuhan.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期负责情报传递和人员护送的核心机构，吴德峰曾任局长。
description.en: A key early organization of the CPC responsible for intelligence transmission and personnel escort, where Wu Defeng served as director.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人，曾负责特科工作，是吴德峰在中央交通局局长职位上的前任。
description.en: An early leader of the Communist Party of China who was in charge of special operations and was Wu Defeng's predecessor as Director of the Central Transportation Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，被誉为“特工之王”，是吴德峰在中央交通局局长职位上的继任者。
description.en: A senior general of the People's Liberation Army, known as the 'King of Spies,' and the successor to Wu Defeng as Director of the Central Transportation Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在郑州市的领导机关，吴德峰曾任市委书记。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Zhengzhou City, where Wu Defeng served as Party Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 吴德峰在中共郑州市委书记职位上的继任者。
description.en: The successor to Wu Defeng as Secretary of the CPC Zhengzhou Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的法学学术团体，吴德峰曾任会长。
description.en: A legal academic society of the People's Republic of China, where Wu Defeng served as president.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国最高人民法院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高人民法院
en: Supreme People's Court of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高审判机关，吴德峰曾任副院长。
description.en: The highest judicial organ of the People's Republic of China, where Wu Defeng served as Vice President.

description.zh-cn: “延安五老”之一，曾任最高人民法院院长。
description.en: One of the 'Five Elders of Yan'an', who served as President of the Supreme People's Court.

description.zh-cn: 中国教育家和政治活动家，曾任最高人民法院院长。
description.en: A Chinese educator and political activist who served as President of the Supreme People's Court.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院早期设立的办事机构，主管政法工作，吴德峰曾任副主任。
description.en: An early office of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for political and legal affairs, where Wu Defeng served as deputy director.

description.zh-cn: 日本培养陆军军官的学校，吴德峰的父亲和伯父曾在此留学。
description.en: A school in Japan for training army officers, where Wu Defeng's father and uncle studied.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国第一任副总统、第二任大总统。与吴德峰家族关系密切。
description.en: The first Vice President and second President of the Republic of China. He had close ties with the Wu Defeng family.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人之一，在长征途中与吴德峰多次发生矛盾。
description.en: One of the early leaders of the Communist Party of China, who had multiple conflicts with Wu Defeng during the Long March.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国开国上将，党和国家领导人之一，在吴德峰的追悼会上致悼词。
description.en: A founding general of the People's Republic of China and one of the leaders of the party and state, who delivered the eulogy at Wu Defeng's memorial service.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，主持了吴德峰的追悼会。
description.en: A former major leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who presided over Wu Defeng's memorial service.

description.zh-cn: 1926年底，吴德峰与湖北省立女子师范学生戚元德结婚。
description.en: At the end of 1926, Wu Defeng married Qi Yuande, a student at Hubei Provincial Women's Normal School.

relationships.target: 湖北省立第一师范学校

description.zh-cn: 1922年，在董必武、陈潭秋推荐下，吴德峰担任湖北人民通讯社社长。1924年2月，经二人介绍加入中国共产党。
description.en: In 1922, under the recommendation of Dong Biwu and Chen Tanqiu, Wu Defeng became the director of the Hubei People's News Agency. In February 1924, he joined the Communist Party of China through their introduction.

description.zh-cn: 1922年，在董必武、陈潭秋推荐下，吴德峰担任湖北人民通讯社社长。1924年2月，经二人介绍加入中国共产党。
description.en: In 1922, under the recommendation of Dong Biwu and Chen Tanqiu, Wu Defeng became the director of the Hubei People's News Agency. In February 1924, he joined the Communist Party of China through their introduction.

description.zh-cn: 在湖北省立第一师范学校就读期间与萧楚女等人结下友谊。
description.en: Forged a friendship with Xiao Chunu and others while studying at Hubei Provincial First Normal School.

description.zh-cn: 1925年夏以个人身份加入中国国民党，1927年“宁汉合流”后脱离国民党。
description.en: Joined the Kuomintang as an individual in the summer of 1925 and left after the 'Nanjing-Wuhan Split and Reconciliation' in 1927.

description.zh-cn: 在邓演达推荐下任国民政府武汉公安局局长。
description.en: Was appointed Director of the Wuhan Public Security Bureau of the Nationalist Government upon Deng Yanda's recommendation.

description.zh-cn: 1930年10月，中共中央成立中央交通局，由周恩来、向忠发、李立三、余泽鸿、吴德峰组成委员会，吴德峰任局长，受委员会领导。
description.en: In October 1930, the CPC Central Committee established the Central Transportation Bureau, with a committee composed of Zhou Enlai, Xiang Zhongfa, Li Lisan, Yu Zehong, and Wu Defeng. Wu Defeng served as the director under the committee's leadership.

description.zh-cn: 吴德峰在长征路上与张国焘多次发生矛盾。
description.en: Wu Defeng had multiple conflicts with Zhang Guotao during the Long March.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国最高人民法院

description.zh-cn: 吴德峰担任最高人民法院副院长期间，谢觉哉是院长之一。
description.en: While Wu Defeng was Vice President of the Supreme People's Court, Xie Juezai was one of the Presidents.

description.zh-cn: 吴德峰担任最高人民法院副院长期间，杨秀峰是院长之一。
description.en: While Wu Defeng was Vice President of the Supreme People's Court, Yang Xiufeng was one of the Presidents.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命爆发后，吴德峰遭到冲击，于1966年6月被免去最高人民法院副院长职务并遭到批斗。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Cultural Revolution, Wu Defeng was attacked, dismissed from his post as Vice President of the Supreme People's Court in June 1966, and subjected to struggle sessions.

description.zh-cn: 1969年，时任中央调查部负责人罗青长写信给康生、周恩来反映吴德峰的情况，促使其获得解放。
description.en: In 1969, Luo Qingchang, then head of the Central Investigation Department, wrote to Kang Sheng and Zhou Enlai about Wu Defeng's situation, which led to his liberation.

description.zh-cn: 1969年五一劳动节，周恩来向毛泽东汇报吴德峰的情况，促使其获得解放。
description.en: On May Day 1969, Zhou Enlai reported Wu Defeng's situation to Mao Zedong, which led to his liberation.

description.zh-cn: 1969年五一劳动节，毛泽东在听取周恩来汇报后表示：“吴德峰是个好同志，一定要解放。”，促使吴德峰恢复名誉。
description.en: On May Day 1969, after hearing Zhou Enlai's report, Mao Zedong stated, 'Wu Defeng is a good comrade, he must be liberated,' which led to the restoration of Wu Defeng's reputation.

description.zh-cn: 受伯父吴元泽和父亲吴元钧的影响，吴德峰在辛亥革命爆发后参加了湖北省革命学生军。
description.en: Influenced by his uncle Wu Yuanze and father Wu Yuanjun, Wu Defeng joined the Hubei Provincial Revolutionary Student Army after the outbreak of the Xinhai Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 吴家与黎元洪在历史上有通家友好关系，来往密切。
description.en: The Wu family had a historically close and friendly relationship with Li Yuanhong.

description.zh-cn: 吴家与黎元洪在历史上有通家友好关系，来往密切。
description.en: The Wu family had a historically close and friendly relationship with Li Yuanhong.

description.zh-cn: 在吴德峰的追悼会上致悼词。
description.en: Delivered the eulogy at Wu Defeng's memorial service.

description.zh-cn: 主持了吴德峰的追悼会。
description.en: Presided over Wu Defeng's memorial service.

description.zh-cn: 吴德峰接替顾顺章担任中共中央交通局局长。
description.en: Wu Defeng succeeded Gu Shunzhang as the Director of the CPC Central Transportation Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 李克农接替吴德峰担任中共中央交通局局长。
description.en: Li Kenong succeeded Wu Defeng as the Director of the CPC Central Transportation Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 李先念接替吴德峰担任武汉市人民政府市长。
description.en: Li Xiannian succeeded Wu Defeng as the Mayor of Wuhan Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 赵武成接替吴德峰担任中共郑州市委书记。
description.en: Zhao Wucheng succeeded Wu Defeng as the Secretary of the CPC Zhengzhou Municipal Committee.
